programme.desc: The foursome, Vilma and TVJ played bumbling orderlies,whose work method was enough to send patients out of the hospital or to undeserved calamity, although they were, in truth, caring and kind-hearted and were only trying to do good.

programme.desc: FPJ played Eseng 45, a Manila policeman known for his proficiency with the 45 caliber gun. He was also known to be an honest and dedicated cop, the nemesis of evil in the crime-ridden area of Tondo.

programme.title: Paano Ang Kahapon... Kung Wala Na Ang Ngayon
programme.desc: Set in the picturesque abaca plantations of Bicol with the perfect Mayon Volcano in the background, this is a film about a greedy family, corrupt politicians and the hapless tenants whose lives crossed their path.

programme.title: Kool Ka Lang
programme.desc: This is the story of five girls living, loving and eventually fighting it out in the big city.

programme.title: Bakit Bughaw Ang Langit?
programme.desc: Why is the sky blue? Why do we love the people we love? These are questions no one can answer. Because is just is.

programme.title: Mga Batang Yagit
programme.desc: This tells the story of young orphans reduced to scavenging among garbage to make a living.

programme.title: Boy Chico Hulihin... Ben Tumbling
programme.desc: This is another look at the brief and violent life of 60's hoodlum Ben Tumbling. This version is from the point of view of Boy Chico, the dedicated cop who killed him.

programme.title: Ober Da Bakod The Movie
programme.desc: The movie version of the popular TV sitcom, Ober De Bakod. This is a story of two families, always in competition -- they are actually neighbors. In this movie, the parents continue to fight and outdo each other, while the children continue their love affairs with each other. However, this time, they all go on holiday -- separately of course. It does not start well, as they all ended up in an isla

programme.title: Ang Titser Kong Pogi
programme.desc: Joey Perez (Bong Revilla, Jr), a policeman goes to Subic as a Kindergarten teacher to secretly investigate the case where he was framed up. He becomes attached to Cynthia, a co-teacher and Jimbo.

programme.title: Akin Ang Pangarap Mo
programme.desc: Leo is engaged to Anita out of convenience since her father and her parents are long time friends. It was never an issue, until Leo meets Gigi during his stay in the family farm.

programme.title: Sinasamba Kita (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Lorna, the illegitimate daughter of a business tycoon was left in the care of her half-sister, Vilma, upon the death of their father. Though she took care of all her material needs, she refused to show the girl any kind of affection.

programme.title: Send In The Clowns
programme.desc: Tito, Vic and Joey play the brothers Roberto, Icardo, and Rodrigo. Tired of getting fired from different odd jobs, they decide to make use of their ability to make people laugh by working as clowns in a carnival.

programme.title: Pacifico Guevarra, Dillinger Ng Pares
programme.desc: Young action star Raymart Santiago played one of his most demanding roles as Pacifico Guevarra who called himself Dillinger after the American gangster whom he idolized.

programme.title: Darna, Ang Pagbabalik (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: While trying to find her grandmother and little brother, Ding, Narda is viciously struck in the head and the stone that furnishes her power is stolen. Before the inevitable face-off with Valentina, Darna gains a new ally when she helps police lieutenant Max Ablan.

programme.title: Kahit Ako'y Busabos
programme.desc: Guiller (Ace Vergel), a young man who grew up in the slums of Tondo as a street toughie. In truth though, he was a kind-hearted man, who was forced to hide the good in him in order to survive in the cruel environment he grew up in.

programme.title: Kosa
programme.desc: Two convicts develop a close friendship because of their common goal which was to exact revenge for their loved ones. Their obssession of getting back at their enemies drove them to escape and to alienate all the people around them including their fellow inmates.

programme.title: Lihim
programme.desc: Bianca and her friends sailed off to the pristine and beautiful Palawan for a few days of fun. Living in the city had made them hungry for the isolation an island resort offers. But then, tragedy struck just when they were starting to have fun.

programme.title: Anghel Na Walang Langit
programme.desc: Vina Morales played two very demanding roles. Two women unrelated and who have never met, but looking very much alike, found their lives entertained when the people close to them mistook them for one another.

programme.title: Miguelito (Batang Rebelde)
programme.desc: Mayor Ven Herera (Eddie Garcia) is grooming his only son Miguelito \"Mike\" Herera (Aga Mulach) to be his predecessor. Mike, however, has other plans and live a happy go lucky life.

programme.title: Berdugo (Gabriel Lorenzo)
programme.desc: He is an honest and dedicated cop whose life shatters when a drug syndicate frames him up and massacres his family.

programme.title: Pintsik Haik
programme.desc: As a head of a small time general services, business and some illegal activity, Mando is satisfied enough on what they earned and share some blessings to the charity. But one day he was hired to rescue the father of May-leng.
